name: The-Makers-Corner
description: A server for social media and sale of classes for at home construction

scripts.start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run start:prod || npm run start:dev
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && npm run seed && cd ../client && npm i

author: Jleimer, kwedwick
